author: cnbc.com
title: The Board of Directors, Management, and Investors of PayCargo Mourn the Loss of Mr. Sergio Lemme
text:
MIAMI--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Co-founder and Chairman Emeritus, Sergio Lemme, passed away in his hometown of Buenos Aires, Argentina on Sunday, April 15 th , 2018 after a four-year struggle with leukemia. Mr. Lemme is survived by his ex-wife Andrea, son Christopher, and daughter Paola.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180427005806/en/
PayCargo Co-founder and Chairman Emeritus, Sergio Lemme. (Business Wire)
Mr. Lemme established PayCargo in 2009 as a subsidiary of First Data Corporation. PayCargo became an independent company in 2014. PayCargo has processed over $2.0 billion in transactions and is the leading online freight payment platform providing electronic invoicing and settlement solutions for global air and ocean cargo.
Mr. Lemmeâ€™s entrepreneurial spirit will forever be part of PayCargo.
